name: MyVocal
tag_list: mobile, audio, podcasting, podcasts, text-to-speech, audio-portals, commuters
overview:
MyVocal is the mobile audio service for commuters & travelers - it allows immediate listening to any spoken-word audio content (podcasts, travel guides, audio-books, user-generated content, any text converted into speech, etc. ) by simply dialing the local phone number.

As opposed to other pure voice services, MyVocal is featured with mobile and web portals helping in finding the content, managing playlist and favorites. Users can add any content or simply submit any audio file or text via email.

MyVocal is also a tool for publishers to bring their content to mobile - with simple web interface publishers can customize and launch in few minutes their braded mobile portal and downloadable Java application with audio streaming.

MyVocal integrates with Twitter and Facebook enabling sharing users’ favorite audio stories and podcasts with friends.
